sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"犹豫，踌躇"之意。
means: hesitate ： 普通用词，一般指在决定干什么，选择什么或说什么等行动之前犹豫不决。
waver ： 指因优柔寡断而迟迟不见行动，或虽作出决定，伸行动上却犹豫不决，因此含畏缩不前之意。

sentence.Network_en: Today I might hesitate to turn in a burglar.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在让我把入室窃贼送交警方，我可能会有所顾虑。

sentence.Network_en: Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

sentence.Network_en: This could make your superiors hesitate to trust you with major responsibilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 这样会使上级不敢对你委以重任。

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)delay or vacillation may have unfortunate or disastrous consequences

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin haesitat- 'stuck fast, left undecided', from the verb haesitare, from haerere 'stick, stay'

entry.def: If you hesitate, you do not speak or act for a short time, usually because you are uncertain, embarrassed, or worried about what you are going to say or do.

example.ex: The telephone rang. Catherine hesitated, debating whether to answer it...
example.tran: 电话响了。凯瑟琳犹豫了一下要不要去接。

example.ex: She hesitated a long time and then she said 'Yes'.
example.tran: 她犹豫了很长时间，然后才说“行”。

entry.def: If you hesitate to do something, you delay doing it or are unwilling to do it, usually because you are not certain it would be right. If you do not hesitate to do something, you do it immediately.

example.ex: Some parents hesitate to take these steps because they suspect that their child is exaggerating...
example.tran: 一些家长不愿意采取这些措施，因为他们怀疑自己的孩子在夸大其词。

example.ex: I hesitated to apply the word 'vulnerable' to him but it came into my mind...
example.tran: 我不愿用“脆弱”这个词来形容他，但它却突然出现在我脑子里了。

entry.tran: 尽管给我打电话/ 尽管和我们联系
entry.def: You can use hesitate in expressions such as 'don't hesitate to call me' or 'don't hesitate to contact us' when you are telling someone that they should do something as soon as it needs to be done and should not worry about disturbing other people.

example.ex: In the event of difficulties, please do not hesitate to contact our Customer Service Department...
example.tran: 如果遇到困难，请尽管和我们的客户服务部联系。

example.ex: Please don't hesitate to tell either Mr Schrader or myself should you feel ill again...
example.tran: 如果你再觉得不舒服，请尽管告诉施拉德尔先生或我本人。

means.word_mean: 1. pause or hold back in uncertainty or unwillingness;
2. interrupt temporarily an activity before continuing;

auth_sentence.content: I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it...without reservation.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it...without reservation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it...without reservation.

auth_sentence.content: The Russian authorities did not hesitate to blame the Chechens.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Russian authorities did not hesitate to blame the Chechens.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Russian authorities did not hesitate to blame the Chechens.

auth_sentence.content: Never hesitate to share with experienced ones as well beginners.
auth_sentence.res_content: Never hesitate to share with experienced ones as well beginners.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Never hesitate to share with experienced ones as well beginners.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 粘性物质[如粘胶],带粘性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+hes粘附+ive……的→adj.&n.粘性物质[如粘胶],带粘性的
ad增加+hes粘附+ion表名词→n.支持,粘着
hesitate[v.犹豫,踌躇;含糊,支吾]+ion表名词→n.犹豫, 踌躇
hes粘附+itate→粘粘糊糊→犹豫不决

means.word_mean: 犹豫; 踌躇; 迟疑不决

sentences.en: If you hesitate too long, you will miss the opportunity.
sentences.cn: 如果你老是犹豫不决, 那就会错失良机。

sentences.en: She hesitates about the choice between the two dresses.
sentences.cn: 她不能决定选这两件衣服中的哪一件。

sentences.en: She hesitated at the gate of Holyoake House.
sentences.cn: 在霍利约克大厦门口她稍微迟疑了一下。

means.word_mean: 吞吞吐吐，结结巴巴，支吾

sentences.en: He hesitated and told me he was brought up in a shabby and dirty town.
sentences.cn: 他吞吞吐吐地告诉我，他是在一个破旧肮脏的小镇上长大的。

sentences.en: He hesitated to take such a big risk.
sentences.cn: 他不情愿冒这样大的险。

jushi.english: If you hesitate too long, you will miss the opportunity.
jushi.chinese: 如果你老是犹豫不决,那就会错失良机。

jushi.english: He hesitated before diving into the icy water.
jushi.chinese: 在跳进冰水之前他犹豫了一阵。

jushi.english: He hesitated before choosing a book.
jushi.chinese: 他犹豫了一会才选了一本书。
